appDescription: Translate, summarize, and extract text from images and PDFs
translateDescription: Enter text to translate into another language
summarizeDescription: Enter long text to get a concise summary
extractDescription: Upload an image or PDF to extract text
fileRestrictions: PDF (max 5MB), Images: webp, png, jpg, jpeg (max 2MB)
translationDescription: Our advanced translation engine supports over 100 languages with high accuracy and natural-sounding results.
summarizationDescription: AI-powered summarization condenses long documents while preserving key information and main points.
extractionDescription: Extract text from images and PDFs with high accuracy using advanced OCR technology.
askQuestionPlaceholder: Ask a question about the document...
chatWelcome: Hello! What would you like to know about this document?
conciseDescription: Shorten the text while preserving key points
professionalDescription: Make the text more formal and professional
noClipboardSupport: Clipboard API is not supported in this browser.
onlySupports: Only webp, png, jpg, and jpeg image formats are supported
unsupportedFile: Unsupported file type. Please upload a PDF or image (webp, png, jpg, jpeg)
